Posts.EditableText: We made a rustic multi-platform Text-AVG creation tool. HomePage -> txtavg I do not need graphics or sound. Only the mysterious text story of the best is enough. Please do not miss it. P.S. We are seeking a new scenario. Thank you, Cutie YAMADA
Posts.HTML:
We made a rustic multi-platform Text-AVG creation tool.

HomePage -> txtavg
